items.title: 本周最佳苹果优惠：AirTag 四件装创下 64.99 美元的历史新低，AirPods 和 iPad 也同步促销 (原标题: Best Apple Deals of the Week: AirTag 4-Pack Hits $64.99 All-Time Low Price Alongside Sales on AirPods and iPad)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
# 本周最佳苹果优惠

本周，苹果产品迎来多项优惠，主要集中在亚马逊平台。其中，AirTag 四件装创下历史新低，AirPods 和 iPad 也有大幅折扣。

## AirTag 优惠
*   **AirTag 四件装**：售价 **64.99 美元**，原价 99.00 美元，节省 34 美元，创历史最低价。
*   **AirTag 单件装**：售价 **24.99 美元**，为次优价格。
*   [AirTag 图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/zO1nwFYsbyLl11n1Hbh3DujaOnY=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/airtag-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## AirPods 优惠
*   **AirPods Pro 2**：售价 **169.99 美元**，原价 249.00 美元，优惠 79 美元。
*   **AirPods Max**：售价 **479.99 美元**，原价 549.00 美元。
*   [AirPods 图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/77vRTAs0Wp6hEpOcuOYu9GABegE=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/airpods-4-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## iPad 优惠
*   **第 11 代 iPad (Wi-Fi, 128GB)**：售价 **299.00 美元**，原价 349.00 美元，优惠 50 美元，为该型号的次优价格。
*   [iPad 图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/GCLM1RvZVg_HP5S-VWfdsyFLo8s=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipad-halloween.jpeg?lossy)

## 亚马逊其他品牌促销
亚马逊本周还推出了 Anker、Jackery、Ecovacs 和 Satechi 等热门品牌的促销活动，涵盖 MagSafe 兼容车载充电器、便携式移动电源、Find My 兼容钱包和扫地机器人等多种产品。
*   **部分具体优惠包括：**
    *   Nano USB-C 30W 可折叠充电器：15.99 美元 (原价 19.99 美元)
    *   10,000 mAh 磁吸移动电源：34.99 美元 (原价 49.99 美元)
    *   Soundcore V40i 开放式耳机：49.99 美元 (原价 79.99 美元)
    *   10,000 mAh MagGo Qi2 移动电源：56.99 美元 (原价 89.99 美元)
    *   140W 4 端口 USB-C 充电器：79.99 美元 (原价 99.99 美元)
    *   带提灯的移动电源站：79.99 美元 (原价 149.99 美元)
*   [亚马逊促销图片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FTGs7wjJGRicdgNjdo0tWB7XYSw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/anker-halloween-2.jpeg?lossy)

## 更多优惠
如需了解更多优惠信息，可访问 MacRumors 的 Apple Deals 汇总页面。
items.shortSummary: 本周苹果产品迎来多项优惠。AirTag 四件装在亚马逊创下 64.99 美元的历史新低。AirPods Pro 2 优惠 79 美元至 169.99 美元，AirPods Max 也有折扣。第 11 代 iPad (128GB Wi-Fi 版) 降价 50 美元至 299.00 美元。此外，亚马逊还对 Anker、Jackery 等品牌的充电配件和移动电源等产品进行促销。
items.translated_title: 本周最佳苹果优惠：AirTag 四件装创下 64.99 美元的历史新低，AirPods 和 iPad 也同步促销
items.content:
This week Apple's AirTag 4-Pack hit an all-time low price at $34 off, and we're still tracking this great deal today, along with big discounts on AirPods, charging accessories on Amazon, and the 11th generation iPad.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with some of these vendors. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

AirPods



  • What's the deal? Take up to $69 off AirPods Max and AirPods Pro 2

  • Where can I get it? Amazon

  • Where can I find the original deal? Right here

$79 OFF
AirPods Pro 2 for $169.99

$69 OFF
AirPods Max USB-C for $479.99


The AirPods Pro 2 are at a solid $79 discount this week on Amazon, available for $169.99, down from $249.00. You can also get the AirPods Max for $479.99, down from $549.00.

AirTag



  • What's the deal? Get $34 off AirTag 4-Pack

  • Where can I get it? Amazon

  • Where can I find the original deal? Right here

$4 OFF
AirTag for $24.99

$34 OFF
AirTag 4-Pack for $64.99


Amazon has the AirTag 4-Pack for the all-time low price of $64.99, down from $99.00. You can also get a 1-Pack for $24.99, which is a second-best price.

Amazon Sale



  • What's the deal? Save on popular brands like Anker, Jackery, and Ecovacs

  • Where can I get it? Amazon

  • Where can I find the original deal? Right here

$15 OFF
Anker Magnetic Power Bank for $34.99

$554 OFF
Ecovacs Deebot T30S Pro Robot Vacuum for $545.99


Amazon this week has a few notable sales from popular brands like Satechi, Jackery, Anker, and Ecovacs. These include discounts on everything from MagSafe-compatible car chargers to portable power stations, Find My compatible wallets, and robot vacuums. You can find every deal in our original post.

  • Nano USB-C 30W Foldable Charger - $15.99, down from $19.99

  • 10,000 mAh Magnetic Power Bank - $34.99, down from $49.99

  • Soundcore V40i Open-Ear Headphones - $49.99, down from $79.99

  • 10,000 mAh MagGo Qi2 Power Bank - $56.99, down from $89.99

  • 140W 4-Port USB-C Charger - $79.99, down from $99.99

  • Power Station with Lantern - $79.99, down from $149.99



iPad



  • What's the deal? Get $50 off 11th gen iPad

  • Where can I get it? Amazon

  • Where can I find the original deal? Right here

$50 OFF
128GB Wi-Fi iPad for $299.00

$50 OFF
256GB Wi-Fi iPad for $399.00

$50 OFF
512GB Wi-Fi iPad for $599.00


Amazon this week is taking $50 off Wi-Fi models of Apple's 11th generation iPad. Prices start at $299.00 for the 128GB Wi-Fi iPad, down from $349.00, a second-best price on this model.

If you're on the hunt for more discounts, be sure to visit our Apple Deals roundup where we recap the best Apple-related bargains of the past week.



Deals Newsletter


Interested in hearing more about the best deals you can find as we head into the holidays? Sign up for our Deals Newsletter and we'll keep you updated so you don't miss the biggest deals of the season!

items.title: 据报道，苹果公司正在推进地图应用中的广告业务 (原标题: Apple Reportedly Moving Ahead With Ads in Maps App)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# 苹果地图广告业务进展

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼的报道，苹果地图应用最早可能在明年集成广告。

## 主要信息点：

*   **广告计划推进**：古尔曼在其最新的“Power On”时事通讯中指出，苹果在iOS中引入更多广告的计划“正在获得关注”，地图应用将是下一个目标。
*   **付费推广模式**：该项目将允许餐厅和其他企业付费，使其详细信息在地图搜索结果中更显著地显示。
*   **类似App Store广告**：这一系统据称与App Store中的搜索广告类似，后者允许开发者付费使其软件在相关查询结果的推广位置出现。
*   **AI驱动的搜索**：据报道，苹果的方法将利用人工智能来提供相关且有用的结果，并提供比谷歌等公司更好的界面。
*   **潜在消费者反弹**：古尔曼警告称，此举可能会引发一定程度的消费者强烈反对。

![iOS 26 Maps Glass](https://images.macrumors.com/t/BJXtpWUiXJQgg3W4MjlaxQT1_YA=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iOS-26-Maps-Glass.jpg?lossy)
![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 据彭博社报道，苹果公司正推进在地图应用中引入广告，最早可能于明年实现。该计划允许餐厅等商家付费，使其在搜索结果中获得更显著的展示位置，类似于App Store的搜索广告模式。苹果将利用AI提供相关结果，但此举也可能引发消费者不满。
items.translated_title: 据报道，苹果公司正在推进地图应用中的广告业务
items.content:
Apple Maps could feature integrated ads as soon as next year, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman reports.


In his latest "Power On" newsletter, Gurman said that Apple's plan to bring more ads to iOS is moving "gaining traction," with the Maps app being next in line. The project will apparently give restaurants and other businesses the option to pay to have their details featured more prominently in search.

The system is said to be similar to Search Ads in the App Store, which allows developers to pay to have their software appear in a promoted slot above other results for relevant queries. Apple's approach reportedly leverages AI to deliver relevant and useful results, in a better interface than similar offerings from Google and other companies. Gurman warned that the move risks some amount of consumer backlash.

Tags: Apple Maps, Bloomberg, Mark Gurman

This article, "Apple Reportedly Moving Ahead With Ads in Maps App" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: M6 iPad Pro 可能配备均热板散热 (原标题: M6 iPad Pro Likely to Feature Vapor Chamber Cooling)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
## M6 iPad Pro 将引入均热板散热技术

根据彭博社马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）在其“Power On”时事通讯中的报道，苹果正计划为iPad Pro引入均热板（vapor chamber）散热系统，类似于iPhone 17 Pro可能采用的方案。

### 核心计划与原因
*   **引入均热板散热**：苹果计划为iPad Pro配备液冷系统，以应对其日益强大的芯片性能。
*   **应对未来芯片**：下一代iPad Pro预计将搭载“M6”芯片，该芯片可能采用台积电2纳米工艺制造，性能的提升需要更高效的散热。
*   **缓解性能节流**：这种液冷系统将有助于减轻设备在处理高强度工作流程时的性能节流（throttling）问题。

### 发布时间与未来展望
*   **发布预测**：均热板散热功能最早可能随下一代iPad Pro一同推出。
*   **更新周期**：根据古尔曼的说法，苹果iPad Pro的更新周期大约为18个月，因此下一代型号预计将在2027年春季发布。
*   **技术扩展**：如果均热板技术在iPhone和iPad Pro上的应用取得成功，苹果可能会考虑将其推广到其他被动散热设备，例如MacBook Air。

### 相关图片

![iPad Pro 2024 Space Black](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TIEfWmcRCITRmZ4RvSs_neWTCsE=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/iPad-Pro-2024-Space-Black.jpg?lossy)

![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 根据彭博社马克·古尔曼的报道，苹果计划为iPad Pro引入均热板散热技术，以应对未来M6等更强大芯片产生的热量。此液冷系统将有助于缓解高强度工作流程下的性能节流。该功能预计最早随下一代iPad Pro在2027年春季推出。如果成功，该技术未来可能扩展到MacBook Air等被动散热设备。
items.translated_title: M6 iPad Pro 可能配备均热板散热
items.content:
Apple is planning to bring an iPhone 17 Pro-style vapor chamber to the iPad Pro, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


In the latest edition of his "Power On" newsletter, Gurman explained that with increasingly powerful chips, Apple is planning to bring vapor chamber cooling to the ‌iPad Pro‌. The new feature could arrive as soon as with the next generation, which will likely feature the "M6" chip made with TSMC's 2-nanometer process. The liquid cooling system would help mitigate throttling, especially as the ‌iPad Pro‌ becomes more capable at handling intense workflows.

If the move to bring a vapor chamber to the iPhone and ‌iPad Pro‌ prove successful, Apple could turn its attention to bringing the technology to other passively cooled devices like the MacBook Air. Apple is now seemingly operating an approximate 18-month refresh cycle for the ‌iPad Pro‌, so next-generation model should arrive in the spring of 2027, according to Gurman.

Related Roundup: iPad Pro
Tags: Bloomberg, Mark Gurman
Buyer's Guide: iPad Pro (Buy Now)

This article, "M6 iPad Pro Likely to Feature Vapor Chamber Cooling" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 苹果为开发者举办Vision Pro特别活动 (原标题: Apple Hosts Special Vision Pro Event for Developers)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# 苹果为开发者举办Vision Pro特别活动

苹果公司在M5 Vision Pro发布周期间，为开发者举办了一场为期两天的“与苹果会面”特别活动。此次活动旨在帮助开发者为visionOS 26构建沉浸式媒体和交互式应用。

![Vision Pro M5 Demo](https://images.macrumors.com/t/z2v-4lf2cDe3mFPAvhxAiXBbzAI=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/Vision-Pro-M5-Demo.jpg?lossy)

## 活动概览

活动在位于库比蒂诺的苹果开发者中心举行，主要内容包括：

### 第一天：沉浸式与交互式故事叙述

*   **主题：** 学习如何利用visionOS 26讲述具有影响力的沉浸式和交互式故事。
*   **核心内容：**
    *   如何为Apple沉浸式视频等格式构思创意。
    *   探索过往制作的真实案例。
    *   如何设计空间交互。
    *   如何讲述让观众成为体验一部分的故事。
    *   如何利用SharePlay和空间人物（spatial Personas）帮助人们通过创意进行连接。

### 第二天：深入探讨Apple沉浸式视频与空间音频

*   **主题：** 深入了解Apple沉浸式视频和Apple空间音频。
*   **核心内容：**
    *   如何创造全新的媒体体验。
    *   Apple沉浸式视频的入门指南。
    *   探索新的制作工作流程。
    *   深入了解之前的Apple沉浸式制作。

## 资源与发布信息

*   **活动录像：** 两天的完整活动录像均可在Apple开发者YouTube频道回放。
*   **Vision Pro发布：** M5 Vision Pro于10月15日发布，并于10月22日开始店内销售。
items.shortSummary: 苹果在M5 Vision Pro发布周期间，为开发者举办了一场为期两天的“与苹果会面”活动。此次活动旨在指导开发者为visionOS 26构建沉浸式媒体和交互式应用。内容涵盖Apple沉浸式视频创建、空间交互设计、SharePlay和空间人物应用，以及Apple空间音频的深入探讨。开发者学习了如何讲述引人入胜的沉浸式故事，并探索了新的制作流程。活动录像已在Apple开发者YouTube频道上线。
items.translated_title: 苹果为开发者举办Vision Pro特别活动
items.content:
Apple used the launch week of the M5 Vision Pro this week to run a two-day "Meet with Apple" program for developers, with a focus on building immersive media and interactive apps for visionOS 26.


Apple invited developers to its Developer Center in Cupertino, hosting sessions on how to create Apple Immersive Video, design spatial interactions, and use features such as SharePlay and spatial Personas.

During this Day 1 livestream, we'll show how visionOS 26 can help you tell impactful immersive and interactive stories. You'll learn how to frame your creative ideas for formats like Apple Immersive Video and explore real-world examples from past productions. You'll discover how to design for spatial interaction and tell stories that make the audience part of your experience. And you'll find out how to use SharePlay and spatial Personas to help people connect over your ideas.

On Day 2, we'll dive deep into Apple Immersive Video and Apple Spatial Audio. You'll discover how to create entirely new media experiences, get started with Apple Immersive Video, explore new production workflows, and dig into previous Apple Immersive productions.


Full recordings of both day one and day two are available for replay on the Apple Developer YouTube channel. Apple announced the M5 Vision Pro on October 15 and in-store availability began on October 22.
Related Roundup: Apple Vision Pro
Buyer's Guide: Vision Pro (Buy Now)
Related Forum: Apple Vision Pro

This article, "Apple Hosts Special Vision Pro Event for Developers" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 开发者现在可以用苹果的 Swift 语言开发安卓应用 (原标题: Developers Can Now Make Android Apps With Apple's Swift)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# Swift SDK for Android 发布：开发者可用 Swift 构建安卓应用

本周，Swift SDK for Android 的首个预览版正式发布，标志着开发者现在可以使用官方工具，以 Swift 语言构建安卓应用，并能更便捷地在 iOS 和 Android 平台间共享代码。

![swift for android](https://images.macrumors.com/t/mZStIehaVQFmLuDe2ptVmmunRLs=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/swift-for-android.jpg?lossy)

## 主要特性和优势

*   **官方工具支持**：该 SDK 允许开发者使用官方支持的工具而非社区解决方案来构建 Swift 安卓应用。
*   **Swift Android 工作组**：早在今年六月，苹果就宣布将通过在 Swift 开源项目中成立专门的 Android 工作组，正式扩展 Swift 编程语言以支持 Android 应用开发。
*   **互操作性**：`swift-java` 负责处理 Android 互操作性，能够自动生成 Java 和 Swift 之间的绑定，使开发者可以将 Swift 代码与现有的 Android API 和 Java 代码一同使用。
*   **代码复用**：Swift Package Index 现在会标记支持 Android 的软件包，并且目前已有超过 25% 的软件包可以在 Android 上构建，为开发者提供了可复用的代码基础。

## 可用性和资源

*   **预览版获取**：Swift SDK for Android 已以每夜预览版的形式提供，可随 Swift for Windows 安装程序一同捆绑获取，或作为独立下载供 Linux 和 macOS 用户使用。
*   **入门指南和示例**：新的“入门指南”提供了端到端的设置说明，并附带了一系列用 Swift 编写的 Android 示例项目，以展示完整的工作流程。
*   **未来展望**：该工作组正在准备一份愿景文档，以设定未来的优先事项，并在一个公开的项目看板上跟踪进展。
items.shortSummary: Swift SDK for Android 的首个预览版已发布，允许开发者使用官方工具以 Swift 语言开发安卓应用。此举旨在简化 iOS 和 Android 间的代码共享。通过 `swift-java` 实现 Java 和 Swift 互操作，Swift Package Index 也已支持 Android。开发者可获取预览版、入门指南及示例项目，未来将有更多功能规划。
items.translated_title: 开发者现在可以用苹果的 Swift 语言开发安卓应用
items.content:
The first preview release of the Swift SDK for Android was published this week, allowing developers to build Android apps in Swift with official tooling and making it easier to share code across iOS and Android.


The SDK enables Android apps to be built in Swift using officially supported tooling rather than community workarounds. In June, it was announced that Apple's Swift programming language would be officially extended to support Android app development through the establishment of a dedicated Android Working Group within the Swift open-source project.

Android interoperability is handled by swift-java, which can automatically generate bindings between Java and Swift so developers can use Swift code alongside existing Android APIs and Java code. The Swift Package Index now marks packages with Android support and says over 25% of all packages already build on Android, giving developers a base of reusable code.

The Swift SDK for Android is already available in nightly preview form bundled with the Swift for Windows installer or as a separate download for Linux and macOS users. A new Getting Started guide with end-to-end setup instructions and a set of example Android projects written in Swift to illustrate complete workflows is also available.

The group is preparing a vision document to set future priorities and is tracking progress on a public project board.
Tags: Android, Swift

This article, "Developers Can Now Make Android Apps With Apple's Swift" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 苹果11英寸M5 iPad Pro在亚马逊上创下949美元新低价 (原标题: Apple's 11-Inch M5 iPad Pro Hits New Low Price of $949 on Amazon)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
# 苹果11英寸M5 iPad Pro亚马逊新低价

亚马逊近日为苹果新款M5 iPad Pro推出了多项优惠，其中11英寸入门级M5 iPad Pro更是达到了历史最低价。

## 主要优惠详情

*   **11英寸M5 iPad Pro**：
    *   当前售价：949.00美元
    *   原价：999.00美元
    *   折扣：50.00美元（创历史新低）
    *   这是目前11英寸M5 iPad Pro最显著的折扣之一，其他型号通常只有约25美元的优惠。

*   **13英寸M5 iPad Pro**：
    *   256GB Wi-Fi型号：1,249.00美元（优惠50美元）
    *   512GB Wi-Fi型号：1,449.00美元（优惠50美元）
    *   2TB Wi-Fi纳米纹理玻璃型号：2,299.00美元（优惠100美元）

## M5 iPad Pro主要特性

新款M5 iPad Pro于本周发布，其主要亮点包括：
*   搭载全新的M5芯片，提供强大的性能。
*   配备更快的SSD存储。
*   集成N1芯片，支持Wi-Fi 7和蓝牙6，提供更快的无线连接。

## 图片展示

![ipad pro orange](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7O-cLDtSKrTT1_Zr2AOtUfmZvFg=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipad-pro-orange.jpeg?lossy)

## 其他信息

*   MacRumors是亚马逊的联盟合作伙伴，通过其链接购买可能会获得少量佣金。
*   读者可以访问MacRumors的“Apple Deals”汇总页面或订阅其“Deals Newsletter”以获取更多苹果产品的折扣信息。
items.shortSummary: 亚马逊将苹果11英寸M5 iPad Pro的价格降至历史新低949美元（优惠50美元），这是该型号目前最优惠的折扣之一。同时，13英寸M5 iPad Pro的多个配置也享受最高100美元的优惠。新款M5 iPad Pro搭载M5芯片、更快的SSD以及支持Wi-Fi 7和蓝牙6的N1芯片。
items.translated_title: 苹果11英寸M5 iPad Pro在亚马逊上创下949美元新低价
items.content:
Yesterday we started tracking notable discounts on Apple's new M5 iPad Pro, with deals mostly focused on 13-inch models. Today, Amazon has now introduced a new all-time low price on the entry-level 11-inch M5 iPad Pro, available for $949.00, down from $999.00.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with Amazon. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

In terms of the 11-inch M5 iPad Pro, this is still one of the only steeper discounts, with others sitting around $25 off. If you're shopping for the 13-inch M5 iPad Pro, you'll find the 256GB Wi-Fi model for $1,249.00 ($50 off), the 512GB Wi-Fi model for $1,449.00 ($50 off), and the 2TB Wi-Fi Nano-Texture Glass model for $2,299.00 ($100 off).

$50 OFF
11-inch M5 iPad Pro (256GB Wi-Fi) for $949.00


The M5 iPad Pro launched this week, and features the new M5 chip, faster SSDs, N1 chip for Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 6, and more. If you're on the hunt for more discounts, be sure to visit our Apple Deals roundup where we recap the best Apple-related bargains of the past week.



Deals Newsletter


Interested in hearing more about the best deals you can find as we head into the holidays? Sign up for our Deals Newsletter and we'll keep you updated so you don't miss the biggest deals of the season!




Related Roundup: Apple Deals
